article_title: Single-payer backers say plan would rein in costs

article_metadata.author: Christian M. Wade Statehouse reporter

og.description: BOSTON — Nearly a decade after Massachusetts started requiring every citizen to carry health insurance, advocates say they’re building support to transform health care in the state once again.
